DOC.brief_summary: During laparoscopic cholecystectomy , Pneumoperitoneum could affect regional oxygen saturation brain . positive end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) could improve respiratory parameter include oxygenation . So applying PEEP could improve regional brain oxygen saturation ( rSO2 )
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Positive End Expiratory Pressure ( PEEP ) During Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: During laparoscopic cholecystectomy , Pneumoperitoneum could affect regional oxygen saturation brain due increase intracranial pressure , central venous pressure make bad respiratory parameter . Positive end expiratory pressure could improve respiratory parameter include oxygenation . So applying PEEP could improve regional oxygen saturation brain pneumoperitoneum laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
DOC.criteria: ASA I II , 2065 year , patient undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy cerebrovascular disease , coronary artery disease , morbid obesity ( BMI > 30 ) propofol allergy , addictive
